org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.workspaces

Class Workspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.workspaces.Workspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFileSpecificationGetter, IWorkspace

    public final class Workspace
extends Object
implements IWorkspace
    Maintains a collection of ICompilerProject's in the workspace and state that is shared across multiple CompilerProject's

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutorService

        public ExecutorService getExecutorService()
        Gets the ExecutorService to use in this workspace.
        Returns:
        The ExecutorService to use in this workspace.

      • startIdleState

        public void startIdleState()
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Waits for all pending operation on all ICompilationUnit's in all ICompilerProjects in this IWorkspace to complete. The activity lock will also be acquired in this call, so once this method has been called, no new work can be submitted until after the lock has been released by calling IWorkspace.endIdleState(Map).

        This method must never be called from an ICompilationUnit operation as that would result in dead lock.

        Specified by:
        startIdleState in interface IWorkspace

      • endIdleState

        public void endIdleState(Map<ICompilerProject,Set<ICompilationUnit>> cusToUpdate)
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Updates symbol table entries for all the ICompilationUnits in the specified map and unlocks the lock acquired by calling IWorkspace.startIdleState().
        Specified by:
        endIdleState in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        cusToUpdate - Map from ICompilerProject to Set of ICompilationUnits in the project whose externally visible symbols need to be re-registered with the symbol table of the containing ICompilerProject.

      • startBuilding

        public void startBuilding()
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Waits for the workspace to leave the idle state and prevents all threads from putting the workspace into the idle state. Calls to this method must be balanced with calls to IWorkspace.doneBuilding().
        Specified by:
        startBuilding in interface IWorkspace

      • doneBuilding

        public void doneBuilding()
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Allows the workspace to enter the idle state once all pending operations are completed. Each call to this method should succeed exactly one call to IWorkspace.startBuilding().
        Specified by:
        doneBuilding in interface IWorkspace

      • startRequest

        public void startRequest(boolean requestNeededForFileScope)
        Called by code in RequestMaker when a request is about to be submitted for execution. Blocks until the workspace has left the idle state.
        Parameters:
        requestNeededForFileScope - true if the request that is about to be submitted for execution is needed to build an IFileScope.

      • endRequest

        public void endRequest()
        Called by code in RequestMaker when a request has completed execution.

      • isBuilding

        public boolean isBuilding()
        Determines if there is any currently running build activity in the workspace. This method should only be called from assert statements, it is meant only for debugging.
        Returns:
        true if there is any build activity, false otherwise.

      • setProfilingDelegate

        public void setProfilingDelegate(IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate profilingDelegate)
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Sets the IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate on the workspace.
        Specified by:
        setProfilingDelegate in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        profilingDelegate - IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate that will receive profiling information. Can be null, in which case no profiling information is collected.

        public void close()
        Close the workspace. It is illegal to use the workspace after it has been closed.

      • swcChanged

        public void swcChanged(Collection<ICompilationUnit> unitsRemoved,
              Collection<ICompilationUnit> unitsAdded,
              Runnable runWhileIdle)
        When an ISWC has changed in memory, invalidate any compilation units which depend on the units which depend on the SWC
        Parameters:
        unitsRemoved - The collection of compilation units to be removed.
        unitsAdded - The collection compilation units to be added.

      • fileChanged

        public void fileChanged(IFileSpecification changedFile)
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Called by clients of the driver object model when a file change has been detected. It is the duty of the caller to ensure no new threads are created until after this call has completed.
        Specified by:
        fileChanged in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        changedFile - An IFileSpecification that can be used to get the change filename.

      • fileRemoved

        Specified by:
        fileRemoved in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        removedFile - An IFileSpecification that can be used to get the new contents of the removed file.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • addCompilationUnit

      • addIncludedFilesToCompilationUnit

        public void addIncludedFilesToCompilationUnit(ICompilationUnit includingCompilationUnit,
                                     Collection<String> includedFiles)
        Specifies that the specified compilation unit includes the specified list of files. Called by ICompilationUnit's when they discover included files.
        Parameters:
        includingCompilationUnit - ICompilationUnit that contains include statements that reference the specified list of files.
        includedFiles - The included files.

      • removeIncludedFilesToCompilationUnit

                                        Collection<String> includedFiles)
        Remove any references to the compilation unit to the collection of include files it includes.
        Parameters:
        includingCompilationUnit - ICompilationUnit that contains include statements that reference the specified list of files.
        includedFiles - The included files.

        public Collection<ICompilationUnit> getCompilationUnits(String path,
                                               ICompilerProject project)
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Get all compilation units in the specified project related to the specified file name. This method will not return any invisible compilation units.
        Specified by:
        getCompilationUnits in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        path - String to source filename
        project - containing project

      • getInvisibleAndVisibleCompilationUnits

        public Iterable<ICompilationUnit> getInvisibleAndVisibleCompilationUnits(String path,
                                                                ICompilerProject project)
        Description copied from interface: IWorkspace
        Gets an iterator that iterates first over all invisible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject and then over all visible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject.
        Specified by:
        getInvisibleAndVisibleCompilationUnits in interface IWorkspace
        Parameters:
        path - Normalized absolute file name.
        project - ICompilerProject that will contains all the ICompilationUnit in the returned Iterable.
        Returns:
        An iterator that iterates first over all invisible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject and then over all visible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject

        Specified by:

      • getLatestBinaryFileSpecification

        public IBinaryFileSpecification getLatestBinaryFileSpecification(String path)
        Returns the most recent IBinaryFileSpecification given to the workspace for a specified path. If the workspace has not seen the specified path before a new IBinaryFileSpecification is returned. This method assumes that if there is an existing filespec, it is a binary filespec.
        Parameters:
        path - Path for which a IBinaryFileSpecification should be returned.
        Returns:
        The most recent IBinaryFileSpecification given to the workspace for a specified path.

      • getReferenceCache

        public ReferenceCache getReferenceCache()
        Get the ReferenceCache used by this workspace. This is to facilitate caching of IReference objects across the workspace, as many references will be repeated throughout a workspace. Since the IReferences are immutable, they need not be tied to a particular Project
        Returns:
        the ReferenceCache this workspace is using.
